parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: The specified file does not exist.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: There are missing values in the table.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: Some values in the Time column are incorrect.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: Some values in the Weekday column are incorrect.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Welcome to BashCrawl! Your adventure begins now.

parameter.name: help_in_main_menu_command
parameter.description: the help command or selection number that at the main menu to give instructions to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Available commands: ls - List contents, cd <directory> - Change directory, inventory - Display inventory, help - Display help, quit - Exit game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Invalid selection. Please choose a valid command.

parameter.name: start_game_command
parameter.description: The start game command or selection number that at the main menu to start the game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: You wake up in a dark cave. The only way out is to find the golden key and unlock the mystery.

parameter.name: help_in_game
parameter.description: The help command that in the main menu to give available commands list to players.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Available commands: ls - List contents, cd <directory> - Change directory, pick <item> - Pick up item, check-inventory - Check inventory, help - Display help, quit - Exit game.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: You find yourself in a dark cave. You can hear faint echoes of dripping water.

parameter.name: direction
parameter.description: A destination name for moving the player into a room or someplace. Assume that the player just got into the game and did nothing.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Invalid direction. Please choose a valid location to move.

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: You are already at the root directory.

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.description: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.description: A path from the starting point towards the room or place which contain an item. Separate the path by ','. Example: 'home,living room,bedroom'

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: You pick up the golden key. It shines brightly in your hand.

parameter.name: check_inventory_command
parameter.description: The check-inventory command in the game.

parameter.name: directions
parameter.description: A path from the room or place where the player just picked up an item towards victory. Separate the path by ','. Example: '...,...,...,forest'

parameter.name: expected_output
parameter.answer: Congratulations! You have successfully unlocked the mystery of the cave and found your way out to the forest. You win!

parameter.name: exit_command
parameter.description: The exit game command or selection number that at the main menu to exit the game.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: The specified file does not exist.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: The file is missing one or more required columns.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: One or more values in the date column are incorrect.

parameter.name: error_message
parameter.answer: One or more values are missing in the file.
